Frequently Asked Questions

Manorama Online Premium subscription is a digital only subscription that gives subscribers unlimited access to all premium and non-premium articles, a distraction free ad-free experience, and access to exclusive newsletters and events. Subscribers can access their premium digital subscription on website, Android and IOS apps.

  • Premium articles: Unlimited access to all premium articles exclusively for you! Read expert opinions, data-driven stories, insightful analyses and more.
  • Ad-free experience: No ads while browsing the website or app, ensuring faster loading and fewer distractions.
  • Malayala Manorama e-Paper: Daily access to a replica of the printed paper (available only with Premium + ePaper plan).
  • Exclusive newsletters: Curated newsletters with key notes and summaries.
  • Access to exclusive events: Complimentary access to selected virtual & offline events.
  • Exclusive offers from Popular Brands: Access to exclusive coupon codes.
  • Exclusive News: Unlimited access to exclusive content.
  • In-depth Reporting: Complete analysis with background and credible information.
  • Simple Content: Clear, lucid, and informative presentation.
  • Facts and Figures: Stories backed by trusted sources.

Yes. As a premium member you will see no ads on the website or app, ensuring faster loading and fewer distractions.

Yes, you can register using Google, Facebook, or your email ID.
